\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,column sep=small]
	{\mathbf{LHS} \ni f} \& {\{\coprod_p X^p \otimes Y^{n-p} \to Z^n\}_{n \in \mathbb Z}} \\
	{\,} \& {\{X^p \otimes Y^{n-p} \to Z^n\}_{p, n \in\mathbb Z}} \\
	{\,} \& {\{X^p \to (Y^{n-p} , Z^n)\}_{p, n \in\mathbb Z}} \\
	{\mathbf{RHS}\ni g} \& {\{X^p \to \prod_n (Y^{n-p} , Z^n)\}_{p \in\mathbb Z}}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["\sim"{pos=0.6}, between={0.4}{0.8}, equals, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["\sim"{pos=0.6}, between={0.4}{0.8}, equals, from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=4-1, to=4-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
